Package clientBackend.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bank
    Represents the bank, which manages the collections of available resource and development cards, as well as played development cards
    Board
    Represents the physical board, including all tiles, chits, harbors, roads, dwellings, and the robber
    Broker
    Responsible for the transfer of cards between and among the bank and players' holdings
    Card
    Represents the abstract concept of a card.
    Chit
    Represents a number chit that is placed on top of a tile.
    City
    A city is a dwelling that adds two victory points to its owner, and that generates two resources per connected tile per harvest
    DevelopmentCard
    A development card can be purchased from the bank.
    Dice
    Represents the logical collection of dice
    Dwelling
    Represents the abstract concept of a dwelling.
    Game
    Manages the game itself, e.g.
    GameManager
    Manages the collection of all games
    Harbor
    Represents a harbor, allowing for maritime trade.
    Player
    Represents a player in the game.
    PlayerHoldings
    An encapsulation of the cards that a player holds, the knights and monuments that he has played, and the harbors that he owns TODO
    RandomNumberGenerator
    Generates a random number
    ResourceCard
    A resource card counts for one unit of its resource type
    Road
    Represents a road.
    Robber
    Represents the robber.
    Scoreboard
    The scoreboard manages the victory points of all players in the game.
    Settlement
    A settlement is a dwelling that adds one victory point to its owner, and that generates one resource per connected tile per harvest
    Tile
    Represents a tile on the game board.
    User
    Represents a user.
    UserManager
    Manages the collection of all users
